publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-226 Rhoda Grant: Highlands and Islands Transport Authority—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to enter into talks with local authorities and other interested bodies to advance a Highlands and Islands Transport Authority.

S1M-226 Rhoda Grant: Highlands and Islands Transport Authority—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to enter into talks with local authorities and other interested bodies to advance a Highlands and Islands Transport Authority.
S1M-226 Highlands and Islands Transport Authority (lodged on 26 October 1999) Maureen Macmillan*, Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-226 Rhoda Grant: Highlands and Islands Transport Authority—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to enter into talks with local authorities and other interested bodies to advance a Highlands and Islands Transport Authority. Supported by: Maureen Macmillan, Cathy Jamieson
S1M-226 Highlands and Islands Transport Authority (lodged on 26 October 1999) Elaine Smith*

S1M-226 Rhoda Grant: Highlands and Islands Transport Authority-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to enter into talks with local authorities and other interested bodies to advance a Highlands and Islands Transport Authority. Supported by: Maureen Macmillan, Cathy Jamieson, Elaine Smith

S1M-226 Rhoda Grant: Highlands and Islands Transport Authority—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to enter into talks with local authorities and other interested bodies to advance a Highlands and Islands Transport Authority. Supported by: Maureen Macmillan, Cathy Jamieson, Elaine Smith
S1M-226 Highlands and Islands Transport Authority (lodged on 26 October 1999) Marilyn Livingstone*

S1M-226 Rhoda Grant: Highlands and Islands Transport Authority—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to enter into talks with local authorities and other interested bodies to advance a Highlands and Islands Transport Authority. Supported by: Maureen Macmillan, Cathy Jamieson, Elaine Smith, Marilyn Livingstone
